citations.narrative:
In the indoor section of the primary enclosure housing 2 adult dogs the back wall panel has a large area of excessive
scratch and chew damage. The outer surface of the plastic paneling has been severely damaged by the dogs making the
surface rough with jagged edges and exposing the hollow interior space of the paneling. Surfaces in disrepair from
excessive chewing and scratching cannot be adequately cleaned and sanitized and may harbor inorganic matter or
bacteria that can cause illness to the dogs. The plastic material could also potentially be swallowed by the dogs and be
hazardous to their health and well-being.
The facility must ensure that surfaces of housing facilities must be constructed in a manner and made of materials that
allow them to be readily cleaned and sanitized, or removed or replaced when worn or soiled.
Correct by 9 July 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(1) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
In the indoor section of the primary enclosure housing 2 adult dogs the back wall panel has a large area of excessive 
scratch and chew damage. The outer surface of the plastic paneling has been severely damaged by the dogs making the 
surface rough with jagged edges and exposing the hollow interior space of the paneling. Surfaces in disrepair from 
excessive chewing and scratching cannot be adequately cleaned and sanitized and may harbor inorganic matter or 
bacteria that can cause illness to the dogs. The plastic material could also potentially be swallowed by the dogs and be 
hazardous to their health and well-being.  
 
The facility must ensure that surfaces of housing facilities must be constructed in a manner and made of materials that 
allow them to be readily cleaned and sanitized, or removed or replaced when worn or soiled.  
Correct by 9 July 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
